query.statement:
SELECT A.POSID ,B.CS101_HNA ,A.REQNR ,A.ACDAT ,E.CTEXT2 REQKIND ,(CASE WHEN C.PS_PSPID IS NULL OR C.PS_PSPID = '' THEN (CASE WHEN A.REQKIND IN ('2','3','4') THEN SUBSTR(A.POSID2,1,6) ELSE SUBSTR(A.POSID,1,6) END) ELSE C.PS_PSPID END) PS_PSPID ,A.MATNR ,D.MAKTX ,VALUE(A.MENGE,0) MENGE ,VALUE(C.NETWR,0) NETWR ,VALUE(C.AMOUNT,0) AMOUNT ,VALUE((AMOUNT/NETWR) * 100,0) N_A ,RECE_F
FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT031 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST101 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND B.CS101_PJT = SUBSTR(A.POSID,1,6) AND B.CS101_HNO = SUBSTR(A.POSID,7)
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST001 C ON A.MANDT= C.MANDT AND A.QTNUM = C.QTNUM
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT011 D ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.MATNR = D.MATNR AND A.MTART = D.MTART
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE E ON A.MANDT = E.MANDT AND A.REQKIND = E.CODE2 AND E.CODE1 = '3' AND E.LANG = 'ko'
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND A.POSID LIKE #POSID#||'%'
AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,1,6) IN ( SELECT CS122_PJT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST122 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS122_UPN = #UPN# AND CS122_CST = #CST# AND CS122_PJT LIKE '_%' )
AND RECE_F = '3' --½ÂÀÎ
ORDER BY A.REQDATE WITH UR
